page.title: 13THE GHOST AT THE POST OFFICE
page.content: It is said that at Michaelchurch Escley Post Office there is a {ghost.}Many times the post mistress has put things away and then can't find them again, only for them to turn up in a completely different place.She herself has never seen the ghost, though others have.However other {strange things have happened}to her.She has planted flowers,and they have grown in a different place.Once she looked after some keys to her neighbours house.She lost them but they turned up across the road back in the persons house.She has also seen a {light flickering}on the wall.Every time she puts a certain shaped mirror in the bathroom she always finds them broken on the floor.Her grandson has seen{ghostly feet}walking along under a door when no one else was in the house.
